entry.title: Gegenwart
entry.content: bq. "Nur wenige leben in der Gegenwart; die meisten bereiten sich darauf vor, demn√§chst zu leben." Jonathan Swift

entry.title: Beharrlichkeit (perseverance)
entry.content:
Albert Einstein said:

bq. It's not that I'm so smart, it's just that I stay with problems longer.

entry.title: Twenty years from now ...
entry.content: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." - Mark Twain
